content: **find the free version of this pattern here 1 ** nest blanket - create your own little nest to cozy up in wherever you go close your eyes pick your colors and dive into this easy stripe crochet blanket the nest blanket is the perfect size for a lap blanket to snuggle up under on the couch a crib blanket in a baby s nursery or throw it in your car for your next spontaneous adventure the nest blanket pattern is made with the absolute beginner crocheter in mind but a quick project like this is a breath of fresh air for crocheters of all levels with this chunky yarn your stitches are easy to see and you get instant gratification with how quickly this crochet project works up visit www woodsandwool com for the free version of this pattern pattern + download - please note this listing is for a pattern only - pattern is written in us terms - this pattern will be delivered via email in the form of a digital file pdf upon purchase skill level - crochet pattern - this pattern is beginner-friendly but does require some knowledge of basic stitches and pattern reading yarn - this pattern uses 5 colors of a bulky 5 weight yarn you ll need 5 skeins or about 600 yards total copyright the nest blanket pattern and photographs are property of woods and wool and are for personal non-commercial use only you may not alter share or sell this pattern in any way however you are more than welcome to sell the finished product please credit woods and wool by including a link to the pattern listing if selling the finished piece online share your work follow along on instagram at @woodsandwool tag @woodsandwool and use the #nestblanket hashtag to show off your beautiful new blanket 1 https //www woodsandwool com/free-crochet-pattern-nest-blanket/
